author: hollowstrawberry
description: Uses AI to give a unique welcome message for each new user, according to their username and avatar.
install_msg:

:warning: **Important:** Utilizes the OpenAI API, which will cost you a fraction of a penny every time it is used.
```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load gptwelcome
2. Add your OpenAI API key with [p]set api openai api_key,INSERT_API_KEY
3. To enable in the current server, the bot owner must use [p]gptwelcome enable
4. Admins can check and customize the prompt with [p]gptwelcome prompt
5. Test it with [p]gptwelcome test```
short: Uses AI to give a unique welcome message for each new user.
end_user_data_statement: This cog sends to OpenAI the name and avatar of new users joining the server.
